alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE, SOUTHWESTERN PICKAWAY AND CENTRAL ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Greenfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, North Folk Village, Good Hope, Frankfort, Clarksburg, South Salem, Pickaway County Airport, Andersonville, Lattaville and Austin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
